string.text:
A luxury installation not often seen in the Zone. Although it does not offer any protection against mutants or hostile stalkers, it can provide a brief respite against the hostilities of the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Playable
